content.description: Stand start with a good left hand and a slopey right. Work your right foot up to a good smear. Zip to the top with your right hand and latch the good lip. Bring your feet up and top out.
content.location: Just below Crimptonite to the left of Rollercoaster.

content.description: Stand with your hands matched on a small but good crimp. Pull up and rock over the good foot out left, lock in your core and reach up and match on a good set of crimps. From here get ready to commit to the crux, gently move up to the slopers while moving your feet up, just when you think you are going to pop make a quick move to the jug at the lip.
content.location: In a corridor about 6ft right of Main Attraction

content.description: Squat start with hands matched on a good hold. Pick some feet and pop up to a good crimp with your left,  bring your right hand up and match. Swing up to the lip and pull over for the top out.
content.location: On the same boulder as Zipper, the right most route.

content.description:
Stand start the two lowest crimps in the diagonal seam. Bump up to a decent crimp and get ready and toss up to the slopers at the lip. Pick some feet and go for the crimps up and left. Throw a heel up and top out. 

  There is a low start on a left hand crimp and a sharp right hand crimp throwing up to the rail that has been done.
content.location: On the boulder above and a little left of Rollercoaster and Zipper.

content.description: A group of boulders with some overhanging, slab and vertical faces. The classics are Main Event V4, Crimptonite V4, The Shadow Gallery V4.
